interpretation: The "open mailbox with lowered flag" card signifies the arrival of news, messages, or important information. It suggests that you may receive a letter, email, or phone call that will bring you news that you have been waiting for. This card can also represent the end of a period of waiting or uncertainty. It is time to check your mailbox, inbox, or voicemail for messages that may require your attention. This card can also indicate a need for communication or reaching out to others. You may need to send a message or make a phone call to clarify a situation or resolve a conflict. Pay attention to the details and use your intuition to interpret the message. This card can also indicate a need for organization or taking care of administrative tasks. It is time to sort through your mail, pay your bills, or file your paperwork.
